# callAsFunction(count:)

**Instance Method**

Confirm this confirmation.

## Declaration

```swift
func callAsFunction(count: Int = 1)
```

## Parameters

- **count**: The number of times to confirm this instance.

## Discussion

Calling a confirmation as a function is shorthand for calling its [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Confirmation/confirm(count:)] method.
title: callAsFunction(count:)
